ygData.subject: Teleporting mobs - anyone see this yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just read on Stratics that they have added the code they had on test server that causes mobs who can t reach you due to pathing problems to be able to
ygData.messageBody:
I just read on Stratics that they have added the code they had on test
server that causes mobs who can't reach you due to pathing problems to
be able to teleport to you. However, the article on Stratics said it
happened to a party in lower guk, where a group of mobs teleported into
a room with one. As our AE songs are likely to set off mobs in other
parts of the dungeon more than anything anyone else can do, I was
wondering if anyone has seen mobs mysteriously teleport into a fight
anywhere yet.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
